description: The Pitney Bowes Complete Shipping APIs let you integrate shipping services from multiple carriers, including USPS® and Newgistics®, into your services and applications.
name: pitney-bowes

scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec test/* && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
